description.p: You may use natural weapons or unarmed strikes as your off-hand weapon while attacking using the bonus action granted by light weapons.
If you do so, you do not add your ability modifier to the damage roll.
If you use an unarmed strike, its damage dice is 1d4, unless another feature allows you to use another dice.
